<color=orange>Excavation Site</color> Clue: There is another QM locator on BH and you can learn to use the rule of imaging from afar there?
1
BELLS: Friends, what incredible devices you have constructed in our separation... To think you have built a device capable of tracking the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon's</color> precise location at all times!
2
1
ANNONA: It is the only metallic lining in our clan's long separation, my friend.. That we may now share and bask in what each other has achieved in our reunion.
3 2
ANNONA: But, I must correct you on one front. Whenever the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> travels to the sixth location, the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> becomes unable to track its signal.
4 3
ANNONA: Until we develop more sophisticated ways of tracking the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon,</color> I fear this locator will not be able to track its position as precisely as we may wish.
5
4
BELLS: Annona, the Nomai on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> may have some knowledge to share in this regard!
6
5
BELLS: I am unsure how it functions exactly.. But I have heard that there is a device on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow,</color> capable of tracking the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> as it visits the sixth location!
7
6
ANNONA: How intriguing.. Bells, would you mind guiding me to this <color=orange>Sixth Location Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> sometime? I would be quite keen to learn more about it.
8
7
ANNONA: Though it sounds exciting to search <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> for this <color=orange>Sixth Location Locator</color> on my own, I would be quite worried about falling into the black hole by accident while exploring.
9
8
BELLS: It would be my honor to be your guide, my friend.
10
9
BELLS: And do not worry! The <color=orange>Sixth Location Locator</color> is visible from <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow's</color> surface; we will not need to venture below the surface to find it!
